Challenge:
ClickFire Media was challenged to create an engaging interactive video for Z-Pore to live on the GoodSkin Labs Facebook page.

Execution
CFM produced the video from start to finish, beginning an in-house video shoot. The interactive video features key points from GoodSkin Labs experts, including Global Brand Endorser Dr. Paul Jarrod Frank as well as several clickable segments that allow people to learn more about enlarged pores and how Z-Pore can help. At the end of the interactive video, users can also take a quiz, watch additional videos from GoodSkin Labs consumers as well as a Kohls.com purchasing call-to-action. The interactive video is featured in a custom Facebook tab on the GoodSkin Labs page.
